entry.title: Editor - document #336: New GLUE Specification V 2.1 ready for public comment
entry.content:
• Status changed from submitted to AD review
  • Assignee set to Andre Merzky

Thanks for this, John-Paul. I have completed the initial review, and this document seems to be in order.

Prior to 60-day public comment, we should receive an Area Director review.
- Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #336: New GLUE Specification V 2.1 ready for public comment
entry.content:
• Assignee changed from Andre Merzky to Jens Jensen

Apologies for the delay with initial AD review of this document. We will try to get it done within the next few weeks.

entry.title: Editor - document #336: New GLUE Specification V 2.1 ready for public comment
entry.content: Can someone load the document into Redmine so we can see it please?

entry.title: Editor - document #336: New GLUE Specification V 2.1 ready for public comment
entry.content:
• Status changed from AD review to public comment
  • Assignee changed from Jens Jensen to Greg Newby

Per the standards council telecon of January 11, this is now approved for 60-day public comment. OGF is working on a email server migration, which we will complete before announcing public comment.

Once it is announced, the WG and community members should be asked to read & review the document.

Standards council noted that the header for section 14 says, "Intellectual Attributes Statement," but it is the standard OGF boilerplate "Intellectual Property Statement." While the document does have discussion of intellectual attributes, it is preferable that the section label follow the OGF standard of "Intellectual Property Statement."

entry.title: Editor - document #336: New GLUE Specification V 2.1 ready for public comment
entry.content: I made a version of the document with changes accepted. I also made the header change mentioned, fixed the "obsolete" text to align with GFG #152 (1st page), and made the copyright statements (2009, 2019). No other changes.

entry.title: Editor - document #336: New GLUE Specification V 2.1 ready for public comment
Editor - document #336: New GLUE Specification V 2.1 ready for public comment
entry.content:
The public comment tracker is here: https://redmine.ogf.org/projects/editor-pubcom/boards/43

    Public comments are open until August 1, 2019.

    Authors/editors: Please encourage your stakeholders to offer public comments, even brief comments that affirm the document has been reviewed.

entry.title: Editor - document #336: New GLUE Specification V 2.1 ready for public comment
entry.content: We were informed that some comments will arrive soon, so public comment is extended until the end of August.

entry.title: Editor - document #336: New GLUE Specification V 2.1 ready for public comment
entry.content: Some comments arrived, and we are still expecting a few more additions. We will extend the public comment until the end of September.

entry.title: Editor - document #336: New GLUE Specification V 2.1 ready for public comment
entry.content: Note: This will be GFD-R-P.239 when published.

entry.title: Editor - document #336: New GLUE Specification V 2.1 ready for public comment
entry.content: Per the standards council teleconference on October 18 2019: Some comments were provided to authors. Additional comments are still expected. We await these further comments.

entry.title: Editor - document #336: New GLUE Specification V 2.1 ready for public comment
entry.content:
• Status changed from public comment to author action
  • Assignee changed from Greg Newby to Jens Jensen

Dear authors/editors: The tracker wasn't updated yet, to reflect current status, so I am doing this now.

My understanding from today's standards council telecon is that all comments were provided by email in October/November 2019, and that the working group has had a phone call to discuss next steps.

These next steps, basically, are for the WG to submit a final document that incorporates needed changes due to public comment (including the late-arriving comments mentioned above).

Please feel free to check with me, or with Jens (who is acting as your Area Director for this purpose), as needed.

Thanks. Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #336: New GLUE Specification V 2.1 ready for public comment
entry.content:
It's been another few months, so I am providing another update. The standards council discussed that the GLUE working group has some energy and interests, and likely also needs some revitalization to continue on their activities.

    Meanwhile, this document awaits integration of comments, and submission of a final version for standards council review. Please let me know if there is anything I can do to assist.
